remarks: Set of objects of the category of unital rings (in a universe). (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ringcbas.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcbas $p |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) $.
